name: ANTH 196O
title: Gender and Politics
description: Analyzes how gender defines those who participate in the public sphere and circumscribes their actions, with particular attention to individuals who identify as female and are engaged in political activities.

pre_req_data.text: Prerequisite(s): ANTH 1, ANTH 2, and ANTH 3; and satisfaction of the Entry Level Writing and Composition requirements. Enrollment is restricted to senior anthropology majors.
